tool_description: Updates existing appointments by changing time, provider, or other details while maintaining data integrity and notifying relevant parties.

appointment_id.description: Unique identifier of the appointment to modify

new_provider_id.description: New provider ID if changing provider

reason.description: Reason for modification: patient_request, provider_change, emergency, system_update

error_messages: Appointment not found: No appointment exists with the specified appointment_id
Invalid reason: Reason must be one of [patient_request, provider_change, emergency, system_update]
Cannot modify past appointment: Appointments in the past cannot be modified
New provider not found: The specified new_provider_id does not exist
Time conflict: New datetime conflicts with existing appointments
Invalid duration: Duration must be between 15 and 180 minutes
No changes specified: At least one parameter must be changed
usage: Provide appointment_id and reason for modification. Include new_datetime, new_provider_id, or new_duration as needed. The tool validates changes before applying them.

modification_id.description: Unique identifier for the modification record

status.description: Modification status: success, failed, or pending

notifications_sent.description: List of parties notified about the change
